name: postiz
tagline: A self-hosted tool for scheduling and managing social posts
description: Postiz is a self-hosted social media management tool to schedule posts, collaborate with teams, and track engagement across platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Schedule posts across Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and other social networks

features.title: Content Calendar
features.description: Visualize scheduled posts on a calendar with drag-and-drop rescheduling

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Work with team members using roles, permissions, and approval workflows

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Store and organize images, videos, and other media assets for reuse across posts

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor post performance with engagement metrics, reach, and click-through rates

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Upload and schedule multiple posts at once using CSV import or batch creation

features.title: Hashtag Management
features.description: Save and organize hashtag groups for quick insertion into posts
